rows.title: Watchdog Analyst Basic Certification
rows.description: Comprehensive exam covering AI safety fundamentals, regulatory frameworks (EU AI Act, NIST RMF, TC260), ethical considerations, and incident analysis procedures. Required to become a certified Watchdog Analyst.
